price: 79. Consagro mi adoración pura y sincera a Quien ha creado los cielos y la tierra; y no soy de los idólatras”.
arabic: إِنِّي وَجَّهۡتُ وَجۡهِيَ لِلَّذِي فَطَرَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ حَنِيفٗاۖ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: innī wajjahtu wajhiya lilladhī faṭara al-samāwāti wal-arḍa ḥanīfan wamā anā mina al-mush'rikīna
